description:
AX scrambles to prevent Rosen Kreuz from destroying Rome with the Silent Noise device, but they may have to act without Abel. Driven by despair, Nightroad considers turning in his gun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Overcount I. The Belfry Of Downfall
